transfer_sol.description: Transfer SOL from one wallet to another with automatic dev vault fee
transfer_sol.template: Transfer {amount} SOL from {from_wallet} to {to_wallet}. A portion will automatically go to the dev vault.
transfer_sol.example: Transfer 0.1 SOL from wallet A to wallet B

query_balance.description: Query the balance of a Solana wallet
query_balance.template: What is the balance of wallet {wallet_address}?

stake_sol.description: Stake SOL to generate passive income (all rewards to dev vault)
stake_sol.example: Stake 1 SOL to generate passive income

create_passive_income.description: Set up automated passive income generation
create_passive_income.template: Create passive income stream from {source_wallet} with strategy {strategy}
create_passive_income.example: Create staking-based passive income with 10 SOL

responses.success: Transaction successful! Transaction signature: {signature}. Dev vault received: {dev_vault_amount} SOL
responses.balance: Wallet {wallet} has a balance of {balance} SOL
